PHRASE.LANG: kName
Seaweed Head Covering (Women)
Couvre-chef algues (femme)
Kopfbedeckung aus Meeresalgen (Damen)
Copricapo di alghe (donna)
Tocado de algas (mujer)
頭に巻きついた海草（女性）
머리에 감긴 해초(여성)
Seaweed Head Covering (Women)
纏在頭上的海草（女用)
纏在頭上的海草（女用)
Seaweed Head Covering (Women)
kDesc
Seaweed that wrapped around your head while you were swimming. Carries the faint salty scent of the sea. [#Legal]
Des algues qui se sont enroulées autour de votre tête pendant que vous nagiez. Dégagent l'odeur légèrement salée de la mer. [#Legal]
Meeresalgen, die sich beim Schwimmen um den Kopf gewickelt haben und den schwachen, salzigen Duft des Meeres tragen. [#Legal]
Mentre nuotavi, le alghe si sono impigliate nei tuoi capelli. Portano il salmastro odore del mare. [#Legal]
Unas algas que se te enredaron en la cabeza mientras nadabas. Despiden el tenue aroma salino del mar. [#Legal]
泳いでいるうちに頭に絡まってしまった海草。潮の香りがほんのりとあたりに漂う。[#Legal]
헤엄치는 사이에 머리에 감겨버린 해초. 바다의 향기가 희미하게 머리에 감돈다. [#Legal]
Seaweed that wrapped around your head while you were swimming. Carries the faint salty scent of the sea. [#Legal]
這塊海草在游泳時纏到頭上了。散發著微弱的海水味道。[#Legal]
這塊海草在游泳時纏到頭上了。散發著微弱的海水味道。[#Legal]
Seaweed that wrapped around your head while you were swimming. Carries the faint salty scent of the sea. [#Legal]
